description: iShop Token is a decentralized and an  ERC20 token built on ethereum blockchain. A token specifically created for shopping and making payment online. IST will be used for peer-2-peer payment and cross boarder payment.   IST algorithm was designed to enable the IST exchangeable with other tokens and stable coin like the TBC, USDT, USDC  and others.  The token would also be used for empowering NGOs that focused on the less privilege children  via donation. The ecosystem of IST will make it become the most widely and adopted token within a short period. Already a lot of partners have indicated interest to work IST. ISHOP Global, the parent company of IST is pioneering an ecommerce site that will accept IST has its major official currency with other cryptocurrencies. Ishop Global on https://i-shop.com.ng
name: iShop Token
